EmailTemplate.subject: 30 day free-trial with GTC and VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Thank you for joining us at GTC Systems' Luncheon and IT Forum. We hope you were able to enjoy learning about the benefits of partnering with different technologies to improve your business, as well as, enjoy If you didn't get a chance to stop by our booth or learn about VMTurbo's application performance control system, we would like to share this case study recently published by Principled Technologies, VMTurbo Enables Greater Performance for Large Virtual Environments by 33% <[[http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/VMTurbo_large_environment_0116.pdf]]>. Want to give it a try? Click here to start your free 30-day trial with GTC <[[http://vmturbo.com/partners/gtc-systems/]]>. Regards, Sean
Sean Connelly Channel Director- West | VMTurbo
